metadata.name: Lemonade
metadata.description:
"Lemonade"

In citrus air, sweet tarts entwined,  
Their dance of love, the aching mind,  
He watches, yearns, yet stays apart,  
In lemon shadows, hides his heart.

-- shot in Bangkok, April 2023

Collectors will have extended editorial Rights, which are defined as the following: Can be used to display privately, or in commercial and non-commercial settings, or in groups with an unlimited number of participants. The license includes unlimited use and display in virtual or physical galleries, documentaries, and essays by the NFT holder. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works.
